original_text: But my words and my statutes, which I commanded my servants the prophets, did they not take hold of your fathers? and they returned and said, Like as the Lord of hosts thought to do unto us, according to our ways, and according to our doings, so hath he dealt with us.
korean_text: 내가 나의 종 선지자들에게 명령한 내 말과 내 법도들이 어찌 너희 조상들에게 임하지 아니하였느냐 그러므로 그들이 돌이켜 이르기를 만군의 여호와께서 우리 길대로, 우리 행위대로 우리에게 행하시려고 뜻하신 것을 우리에게 행하셨도다 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: But my words and my statutes
which I commanded my servants the prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 나의 종 선지자들에게 명령한 그것들은

sentences.original_text: did they not take hold of your fathers?
Like as the Lord of hosts thought to do unto us
sentences.korean_translation: 만군의 여호와께서 우리에게 행하려고 생각하신 것 같이

sentences.original_text: so hath he dealt with us
